sources.name: SourceProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		ModelName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceProduct

sources.name: HubProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		HUB_Product_HK as string,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> HubProduct

sources.name: SatProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		HUB_Product_HK as string,
		SAT_Product_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SatProduct

sinks.name: SinkHubProduct
sinks.script:
NewHubProduct sink(input(
		HUB_Product_HK as string,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> SinkHubProduct

sinks.name: SinkSatProduct
sinks.script:
NewSatProduct sink(input(
		HUB_Product_HK as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		ModelName as string,
		SAT_Product_HDIFF as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> SinkSatProduct

transformations.name: HashColumns
transformations.script:
SourceProduct derive(HUB_Product_HK = sha2(512, ProductAlternateKey),
		SAT_Product_HDIFF = sha2(512, ProductAlternateKey
      ,WeightUnitMeasureCode
      ,SizeUnitMeasureCode
      ,EnglishProductName
      ,StandardCost
      ,FinishedGoodsFlag
      ,Color
      ,SafetyStockLevel
      ,ReorderPoint
      ,ListPrice
      ,Size
      ,SizeRange
      ,Weight
      ,ModelName),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashColumns

transformations.name: CheckNewProduct
transformations.script:
HashColumns, HubProduct exists(HashColumns@HUB_Product_HK == HubProduct@HUB_Product_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'both')~> CheckNewProduct

transformations.name: NewHubProduct
transformations.script:
CheckNewProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductAlternateKey,
		HUB_Product_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	))~> NewHubProduct

transformations.name: CheckNewSatProduct
transformations.script:
HashColumns, SatProduct exists(HashColumns@HUB_Product_HK == SatProduct@HUB_Product_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Product_HDIFF == SatProduct@SAT_Product_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewSatProduct

transformations.name: NewSatProduct
transformations.script:
CheckNewSatProduct select(mapColumn(
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName,
		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeRange,
		Weight,
		ModelName,
		HUB_Product_HK,
		SAT_Product_HDIFF,
		LOAD_TS
	))~> NewSatProduct
